name: Truly Fearsome
description:
This Demo game was made by Enderblaze for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1)

An Axolotl embarks on a quest across it's aquarium, intense and hair-raising,  to meet with a dragon and learn to become "Truly Fearsome"

Plans:

  • Physics Puzzles
  • Urchin Enemies
  • Tank Filter Physics Obstacles
  • Pesky "Thieves" moving Puzzle Objects
  • A Giant Aquarium snaking across the walls of multiple rooms

This is really just a proof of concept, but it could become a full game eventually.

(p.s. I left in an alternative .addForce based movement system. It is very buggy but physics puzzles don't work when the player defies physics. Just press the spacebar to toggle modes, and 'R' to respawn when you inevitably go flying out of the tank)
